title: What are the chances of this
body:
Dear Riot,

It is I, another peasant, approaching thine magnificence and beseeching thee with the most humble of quests.
That quest, of course, is to simply donate a single RP to my unworthy person so that I may be able to go forth and obtain this new form.

My most sincere regards,
Azul

replies.body:
Greetings and Salutations, Azul,

The lords of Rito have convened the Lunar Revel High Council to discuss thy request at length, and the outcomes of the High Council's deliberations are two-fold.  

As a Summoner in good stead, thou hast demonstrated the nobility of your cause.  Thus, the High Council has deemed thee worthy and that, due to the humbleness of thy submission, and in these extraordinary circumstances, thy request for _One Single Riot Point_ shall be granted.

Now go, find your new form...

Kind Regards
Mindstar

One Single Riot Point, Azul, in my opinion, deserves more for style points. 



P.S: Mad respect points gained for Agent Mindstar and the Honorable High Council. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

omg thank you!! ily forevs riot 

[ Azul will remember that ]

Hey Azul,

Just submit your request in a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and one time only they will grant you a small amount of RP for this :3

-DTN
